text:
当然、
２日という時間は
スキーを教えるには
不十分だ
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 6.54%;top: 21.38%;width: 21.49%;height: 12.26%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
そこで
スキーの
代替案を
決めた
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 30.37%;top: 0.79%;width: 16.38%;height: 14.31%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 51.12%;top: 22.41%;width: 13.09%;height: 11.08%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
バスに長時間乗ったし
もう遅い
出発は明日とする
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 67.71%;top: 1.10%;width: 23.30%;height: 13.13%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
だが明日は
午前８時出発だ
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 28.35%;top: 36.08%;width: 16.06%;height: 13.05%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
準備の
できてない
奴は
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 58.35%;top: 35.53%;width: 12.55%;height: 11.64%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
ここに
置いてく。
朝は
狼がでるぞ
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 52.50%;top: 46.86%;width: 15.64%;height: 13.21%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
私がお前ら
だったら
気を付けるな
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 84.95%;top: 48.90%;width: 11.91%;height: 11.32%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 25px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 26.33%;top: 61.16%;width: 14.68%;height: 15.49%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;
